channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Accordion Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Accordion Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2022-4781|2024-08-03T01:48:40.315Z -- unknown -- accordion%20shortcodes
item.description: The Accordion Shortcodes WordPress plugin through 2.4.2 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack.
